Blank DVDs, this is a scam

This is NOT a review of the movies, only the merchandise.
I wanted to find a Blu-ray of Thir13en Ghosts, but every stand-alone version was $20+. This was only $10. Yes, I DID have to accept that it comes with a crappy remake of a classic, but it was worth it.
Fortunately, this is NOT some crappy version with both movies on one disc. Each movie is on its own disc. That means this is just a repackaging of 2 movies into a new case, so these movies are no different from their basic stand-alone versions.
.
Now, if I were to rate the movies, I'd give Thir13en Ghosts 4 stars. Not great, but a lot better than some would say it was. My opinion. House of Wax (remake) would only get 1 star, because I can't give it 0.
Bought this movie only for 13 Ghost. The other movie blows.
